name: LEAP! (LikWid-Official)
description:
No score, no sense of direction, no story, no meaning.

Welcome to LEAP!, my first ever game made in the Godot Engine that has been publicly released.

Please note that this is purely a passion project, and is not intended to be perfect. Thank you!

CONTROLS
SPACE or W | Jump; Press again to quicken your fall
[When in midair] LEFT/RIGHT ARROW or A/D | Dash left or right (respectively)
